resources.string:
This app lets you play the game scrabble.
 In the main window you can choose what you want to do.


To change the settings of the app, (language and so), press the "Settings"-button.
 To view this help, press the "help"-button.
 To view credits and stuff about the app press the "about"-button.


To start a new game, press the "new game"-button.
 When the button is pressed, you can choose dictionary and user to play against.
 Once the game is started, DONT TURN OFF THE PHONE! If the phone loses connection to the server the game is lost, sorry! :(
